surveyIntroduction: In order for us to provide you with relevant help and information, we need to ask a couple of questions about your current situation
surveyIntroductionHtmlB64: In this section we will ask about your intentions for your relationship with your partner or ex- partner. We understand that your feelings about what you would like to do may change, and that you might feel confused. It is best to answer about how you are feeling right now, even if this might be different in the future.

surveySections.surveyIntroductionHtmlB64: These questions are about your current situation and your family

questions.questionText: Do you have any dependent children or step-children under the age of 18?
What is the gender of the partner who made you feel unsafe or afraid?
